user_query: I'm planning a surprise party for my friend's birthday next month. Can you suggest some interesting facts about the number 30 and a funny Chuck Norris joke to entertain the guests? Also, find me the schedule of NBA games on that day and recommend a good team to support.

TaskList.description: Gather interesting facts about the number 30.
Find and generate a funny Chuck Norris joke.
Retrieve the NBA game schedule for the specific date next month.
Analyze the schedules to recommend a popular NBA team to support from the games available.
